fields.name: Plant Bomb:
fields.value: Target a player and place a bomb in their residence. It will explode the night after you outplace that player, dealing an astral rampage attack to your target (with attack power equal to your standard deviation, divided by 10, the night the bomb was placed). You will be notified how many players your bomb attacks and kills. You may place multiple bombs on the same player. If a player is hit by multiple bombs, the attacks will be combined into one attack with 3/4ths of the combined attack score of all the bombs.

fields.name: Deranged Fervor (2x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked the second time your standard deviation is above 27.50%. Use this ability to plant two bombs in one night.

fields.name: Remote Detonation (Locked, Passive):
fields.value: Triggered each time you place in the top 3. All of your unexploded bombs will be converted to remote detonation bombs, going off on a night of your choosing (e.g. "detonate on Alex tonight" or "detonate on Bobby on N3")  instead of based on score; or when you die (see Dead Man's Switch). When this triggers, you will be notified which bombs have not detonated.

fields.name: Dead Man's Switch (Passive):
fields.value: If you die, all of your bombs will explode the same or following night. If 3 or fewer players are alive after this, you also win.

fields.name: Loner (Passive):
fields.value: You are immune to roleblocks until the first time you are targeted by an investigative ability. You are not notified when this passive is triggered.
